files.description: Defines the standard artifact schema for results.json (required/optional keys), figure naming conventions, and metadata fields including git commit, seed, and timestamps with validation helpers.

files.description: Implements a complete artifact writer that assembles metadata (git commit/dirty state, seed, ISO timestamps), enforces the schema, and writes results.json plus provides helpers for deterministic figure/file naming.
